kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kyatubulruwa ku iniya ku thingale ini ku vaga, lu ngudradreadrekadha macalrusi, miyalri thingale ku Dridripungana, paihaihangana si amilryalrikana.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Rukai, as well as Japanese, Hokkien and English.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的魯凱語說得很流利，也會說日本話、閩南語和英語。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa kitubulrungana ku iniya wathingala ku, sika kyabulru saalavavalake ku Dridripungana, ku tauwane ini Amilrika, laikai ki tatwatwatumanane ini kisudalru ku takalra ku paihange, lakuni thingale ku taikalra ka vaga.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an American, and he knows many Chinese at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是美國人，而他工作上認識許多漢人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa kitububulru nai iniya, matikai ku taikalra ku lrigila lu alupu kuigayga.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: eene kadruwaka makathingale demedeme, ai ahakai nai ku suci tukacudu, lai makadulrunga nai kilalra tupudriyadringai.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: saalavavalaka ku kadruwa ka wathingale ikai kakuakudhane nai, matininu ku takakacalrisiyanane li.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa haukakalra ku thingale li, haungyathathingala ku lu amani madu ku Ngudradrekai, amani ku mwakalrivili, amani ku adulruwane madu ngidradraha.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Rukai is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為魯凱族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kaingyaiyaubu, aikela ku agili.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kunaku si kaingu amwa nai maci lwangai ku tahukuku, padulru ku malimeme ka kwaubu pwakane ki agili.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa lribate nai ki talacenga, makalra ku tawnyalralra ka lacenge.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: walangai nai ku kungsingcai, tuba si daikungu.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku yathili ki syubai ki madru ka tauki laiyaikai, malimeme kaivai pangudrale li si mumu, lwangadha ngubekele.
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: la langai nai ku pangudrale si mumu.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa lribate nai ki tabutula, kudra tauki laiyaikai ailangai su ku manema? kaivai tahukuku kaiasaa maadrau si kahicuhu tulru ka idai ku ea.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kau kaingu makucingalre laiya, la kitubulru ki tauki luaimaka tupadulru ku bekela.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kwani tauki latubalre mapadulrunga, kadruwaka aimaka kivalanga.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kudra yathili ka tauki laiyaikai nyama lwangadha ikai kaange li, madrau si lakapadulru.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sabilrila walangai nai ku tahukuku si kaange mutauwana waga pasiete ki cukui.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: maulai nai mukalava si kadradrimitinga.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku agili la pangudingva myaikai twahanau patuicilri paibalriyu naiya, lu adrihainga ki bibilrili aimaka mubalriva ku.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kau kaingu amiyaikai kaiwaagangana ku tuthathathaa, dwaula nikela makanaelre kwane!
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ladawdaulu nai ki lahetesa talrailragi, ku wakela kalringulu kisupilri ikaivai makaelaelaela ka kwaubu.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: yakai ku sapasyasilange li ku sya Usau, wasavidhi kahimuhu iluku ku lamanemane ini.
I have a classmate named Usau, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Usau，他常常忘記帶東西。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: lu kibulrubulru, kyasalru ki sapasyasilange ini ku cingpi, sasupisupilra si cyumingi.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ngivale, ngipusale, ngitulrulu, pakyasalruana iniya makanaelre.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ai, yakai ku ngyalisiya ku kakudhane ini, wasavidhi kisalru sikai saulryulri.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sabilrilanenga kadruwa ka apya pakisalru iniya makanaelre.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: yakai saavaivai, kunai makanaelre mahedela nai kivaevange.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ikai kaelrelrea, kau Usau apya mubingziyunga, ai, mahimuhu iluku ku wisengce.
On the way, Kacaw wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Usau想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: la kisalru ki sapasyasilange ini, ai amiya ikai tubalre iniya, makanaelre miyalriya ku kadruwa ka wailuku.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kau Usau la tubi ki samama. la kalisi myaikai, asi ani kai pakisalru nakuwa makanaelre!
Usau burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Usau急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku sapasyasilange lapelaela iniya, amanisa kaisu ngiyaililuku, lu pakisalru musuwa ku lamanema, lakai su saulryulri!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa mugaku laadhana, ngwalalakese mugaku kau Usau, la saulri demedeme idra kisalru ini ki sapasyasilange ini.
The next day at school, Usau arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Usau很早就到學校了，Usau把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sabau laiya kau Usau ki sapasyasilange ini, laiya ikai lu bibilrili aingiyailukungana ku, la kyaseasene ki sapasyasilange ku tapakisalruwa iniya ku lamanema.
Usau apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Usau向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku ama taha alwalupu ikai ki cekele nai.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa alruladha ku, ku ama si agiini wadavace lu amaungu, iluku ku lrabu si kwange.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: lu kaledra, la kainganai iluku ku pana lini.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: yakailu ababui, yakailu alrava, yakailu apadamatha.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: yakai sakakela ki cekele pavalavala ku pana, pakisupilri ki kinauwacekela.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: luiya makavaladha ku ki ama, api tupalra walupu.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku ama laiya ikai, lu kadraunga su nau iluku musuwa.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku sauwalai ki cekele yakailu ahakai ku kateme pwana, wadahepe ku nipalreea si taenge tukulru.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku ama malrigili ahakai ku tukulru, amiyaikai sahakaiya pwalra ki padamatha, waceele madu ku dalrane ki udryudripi, pyakai madu ki tangukakaiyane lini putukulru.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ngwalai ku asaha tupalra ki tahudrawdrange walupu, kyacakuwana ku luadhane dwahepe ku tukulru, aipadalrunga laipana kai tukulru li.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa ceele ku ama amiyaikai nakuwa lubibilrili aitaha amani su ku mahakace ka tahaalupu.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kaiasaa madrawngana ku, waangeala ku ki buu si lraili li, tupalra ki ama walupu.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: la pakisupilri ki kinauwacekela ku pana li.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku ama amiyaikai, aikiyaseasene ta ki lacucungulane ta ku sasubulrubulruwa mitaa, la patahumaha ku makalra ku pana.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kay myalrealre ngyalalrangaku mugaku.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: samugakuwaku, mahimuhaku kai iluku ku kabange.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kadruwa ka wailuku sanaamanema.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sakibulrubulrunai, taelreaku ki hedelaneli ceele ku hungu.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sasikinginai, ku hedelaneli pakisalru nakuwa ku cingpi si sasupisupilra.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku singsi amiyaikai nakuwa, lubibilrili sahangidrakaala
kai ngilalralalrangenga!""
我今天七點到學校。: The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35293/5: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku talragili sya Sula, miyalri ka lalake ki Ngudradrekai.
My good friend’s name is Sula, and he is also an Rukai child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Sula，他也是魯凱族的小孩。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: taelrenai ikai ki cekelenai Labuwa kibulrubulru.
We study together in the Labuwa tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在大武部落讀書。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: tataelreanenai kilalalra ki mahudrange lu tumaulai, taha malrigilinai Ngudradreadrekadha.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Rukai proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說魯凱語。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: maelrengaku si kabitulru, kau Sula edreka si kahilai.
I am tall and overweight, while Sula is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Sula很矮也很瘦。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kau Sula pahahakaca, madalame makanaelre iniya.
Sula is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Sula很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kayasaa ungdukai ki swa gaku, kay swa gaku pyaiya ku taikalra ku amakalrwalrumala.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: yakai ku mabilibilibili, watetehe ku malri, lrabuwale, udulri si walraili.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kyapaelreaku ki lrabuwale.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: salrabwabuwalaku, mwalrevesaku, kay paculruli twaehaehai.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ai ngyadrakalaku, pacungulu papucucubungu lrwabuwale.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sakelaku ki sakaamudu kudra laumase kyahahagai makanaelre.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: eene kadruwa ka amalra ku icibange, ai kyahahagadhaku, asiluiyaa twalrepengaku ikay kikalrumaleli.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kudhaa kunaku si ama walrikapenai ki agiini.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku agi ki ama madula ku drapaleini.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: peaelaela naiya, ku cavalriya ki daane mabulrutu.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa tupudringadringai ki cavalriya, twalai cavalriya mucilri.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku ama wailuku ku beate ki lwange si sabiki bwai ki agiini.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kunaku si agi ki ama yakainai daane kalaelaelange, peaelaela nakuwa ku makalra ku maulai.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: sa aidavacenai, ku agi ki ama waseba nakuwa madraungasu miya, lahau kathahihi ngisauwalai.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: amiyaku ikai, lu mudringainga ku drapaleini, aikelananaku liniyana kivaevange.
I said, “When your foot gets better, come to our house next time and visit us.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ikay ki 2022 ka caili, kay swasihu yahubu mapelaela pathahukai ikay nibungsiyu ki kacalrisiya ku adulruwa drepele ahakai ku kacalrilrisiyana pwacase ku nagane.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名會議。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kiatubulruwaku ku maulainga papiya ki sihu kihahibici ku akipalrainga drepele ahakai ku kacalrilrisiyana pwacase pikai ki nibungsiyu ka yacengecenge ka sya Cemelresai.
I interviewed Cemelresai, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Cemelresai。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: mapapalrainginai lu ataibalriva aiuwaku liniyana kitububulru iniya.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ikay ki takitububulruwaneli, papiya nakuwa ngipapelaela ku tatualadha ku naganeini, la iluku nakuwa pathingale ki wacekecekeleini, si cekeleini.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kyatubulruwaku iniya asu kakeecengenga naubalrithilringa ki nagane miya, kay sakukakudhaa pwacase ki nagane malisi?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: amiyaikai nakuwa, asiluiyaa lu ahakai ku ciniyukukana pwacase kadruwa ka aimaka pacengecenge patakela ku pathaheva ki naganeini, ku druma ku umase yakaiyana ku 「車先生」 amiya, si mutaluvaivainga ku makalra ku matiyalrupi matipulrivale.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Che Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35293/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「車先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kau Cemelresai amiyaikai, ku nyahakaiya ku kacalrilrisiyana pwacase ka nagane amani ku patengatenga ka naganenai. kay naganeli sapatuthingala ku takasumanemananenai, cucungulanenai, takaumawmasanenai, anatuma lahau takalra ku myanakuwa ka kacalrisiya la palraingi kyumau pasiyulri ku lanaganelini.
Cemelresai said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35293/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Cemelresai說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kudhaa twapalraku ki kaingu mumaci tusyubai, ku kaingu wailuku ku makalra ku ngilralredrekeini ka lacenge, lapiya twakanea ku kacalrilrisiyana ka lakanea bwai ki umase.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: madalame makanaelre ikay syubai ki kaingu, ku tavangulu si cemeameha takalra ku walangai, takalra ku umase ku wakela palalava ku tudamaiini.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and Chinese Angelica, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和山當歸很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku againi ku mawngu si duhai malimeme tuhamuhu, laahakai ku bulabulai si makau cehebe ku beate, ku tasangusadha wathehepe pakainganai ku takalra ku badhabadha, wakela ikay syubainai siyugu makanaelre.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: lu agaga kau kaingu, yathilaku dwaudaulu ku badhabadha, yathilaku walealeale, kay lalacenge ngilralredrekenai, kadruwa ku sababuu, nyama lrwabwala lwangai.
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, “The vegetables are self-grown, all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!”
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: ku kilangainai ku lamanema padalru si kalrepenge, kau kaingu amiyaikai, amanisa ikaisu palribulu lakuni.
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, “It’s all thanks to your help.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: kay takakadra kay, makalra ku kibulruli pathahukai ikay kacalrilrisiyana ka lawacebecebe si lakanea ka thingala, la kipabalra ku sakwalriyalri lu tusyubadha.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

kaiasaa mwagakua ku ki pitu ki tuki ki m: luceelaku ki kaingu ku hangehanganeini kay pathahwakai ki taleke ki kacalrisiya, ngyadradrahanaku si ikai ku lrigu.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
